mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personal_faq (personal_faq_sq, branch_id, member_sq, faq_tp_id, faq_title, faq_detail, faq_status, faq_dt) VALUES (seq_personal_faq.nextval, #{branch_id}, #{member_sq}, #{faq_tp_id}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_detail}, '접수중', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT pf.* ,ft.faq_tp ,b.branch_nm FROM personal_faq pf JOIN faq_type ft ON pf.faq_tp_id = ft.faq_tp_id JOIN branch b ON pf.branch_id = b.branch_id WHERE personal_faq_sq = #{personal_faq_sq}

SELECT Count(*) FROM personal_faq pf WHERE pf.member_sq = 12
AND pf.faq_status = #{dto.faq_status}
